price: Òjíṣẹ́ kan láti ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu yó (sì) máa ké àwọn tákàdá mímọ́.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
